'''Lino Facioli''' is a Brazilian actor. He was born in Brazil but moved to London at the age of four. He is fluent in Portuguese and English. His biggest role to date was in the 2010 movie ''[[wikipedia:Get Him to the Greek|Get Him to the Greek]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he plays [[Robin Arryn]]. He was confirmed in the role on 16 July 2010.
He returned in the role for the [[season 4|fourth]] and [[season 5|fifth]] seasons.<ref>[http://unitedagents.co.uk/lino-facioli]</ref>
